comments.author: gmierz2@outlook.com
comments.raw_text: The live sites patch removed the `-live` suffix for all live site tests in favor of adding a `live` entry to the extra options. The youtube-playback tests use live sites and had this suffix, this bug is for adding that suffix back.
comments.text: The live sites patch removed the `-live` suffix for all live site tests in favor of adding a `live` entry to the extra options. The youtube-playback tests use live sites and had this suffix, this bug is for adding that suffix back.

comments.text:
Created attachment 9143220
Bug 1632993 - Add the removed -live suffix in youtube-playback tests. r?#perftest


This patch re-adds the `-live` suffix to raptor-youtube-playback tests only.
